sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
Good counsel with a seasonable warning to all the inhabitants of Wells in Somerset-shire and elsewhere Read and consider, and the Lord give you an understanding heart. Sandilands, Robert, of Aberdeen.
1 sheet ([1] p.)
printed for Benjamin Clark in George-Yard in Lombard-street, London : 1683.
Signed at end: Robert Sandilands. Dated at end: "... being the 31 of the 11th month, 1682.". Reproduction of original in the Friends House Library, London, England.
=======

1 sheet ([1] p.)
printed for Benjamin Clark in George-Yard in Lombard-street, London : 1683.
Signed at end: Robert Sandilands. Dated at end: "... being the 31 of the 11th month, 1682.". Reproduction of original in the Friends House Library, London, England.
Benjamin Clark
George-Yard in Lombard-street
